title: JPG to PDF Converter | Convert Your Images to PDF Online
text: Convert your JPG and other image files into universally compatible PDF documents effortlessly and at no cost. Smallpdf supports multiple file formats, including JPG, PNG, BMP, GIF, and TIFF images, which can be easily converted to high-quality PDFs. Additionally, Smallpdf can convert Word documents (DOC, DOCX), Excel spreadsheets (XLS, XLSX), PowerPoint presentations (PPT, PPTX), and other document types to PDF. Yes! Simply upload your images, arrange them in your desired order, and click to combine. No. Our converter preserves the sharpness and clarity of your images, ensuring no quality is lost during the conversion process. You'll receive the file format you require while maintaining the original image quality. Convert JPGs to PDFs instantly in any browser with our online tool. No software installation is required. Simply drag your JPG files into the converter at the top of the page to begin. Your files are protected with advanced TLS encryption. For your security, all images are automatically deleted from our servers one hour after processing. Absolutely. Convert any document type for free with a basic account. Upgrade to a Pro subscription for unlimited conversions and access to over 30 PDF tools. Experience the benefits with a 7-day free trial, and you can cancel at any point during the trial.
